metadata.title: Super Shield - Premium Car Heat Insulator
metadata.description: Super Shield is a Saudi brand specializing in high-quality car heat insulation rolls with advanced features and competitive prices. Locally made and tested under the sun.
metadata.keywords: car heat insulator, thermal shield, Saudi Arabia, car protection, heat protection, window tinting
metadata.author: Super Shield
metadata.ogTitle: Super Shield - Premium Car Heat Insulator
metadata.ogDescription: The first thermal shield designed specifically for Saudi Arabia's extreme heat. Join over 300,000 satisfied customers.

Footer.tagline: Locally made and tested under the sun — the first thermal shield designed specifically for Saudi Arabia’s extreme heat. Join over 300,000 satisfied customers enjoying coolness and protection.
Footer.returnPolicyDescription: Our return policy ensures customer satisfaction with clear guidelines for returns and exchanges.
Footer.returnWindowText: You have 30 days from the purchase date to return your product for a full refund or exchange.
Footer.condition1: Product must be in original packaging
Footer.condition2: No signs of installation or damage
Footer.step2: Provide order details and reason for return
Footer.step3: Receive return authorization and shipping label
Footer.contactInfoText: For return-related inquiries, contact our customer service team via WhatsApp or email.
Footer.warrantyDescription: Our warranty policy covers manufacturing defects and guarantees product quality for 5 years.
Footer.warrantyIncludes2: Peeling or cracking of the outer layer
Footer.warrantyIncludes3: Proven loss of thermal insulation properties
Footer.warrantyExcludes2: Scratches or cuts from sharp tools or improper cleaning
Footer.warrantyExcludes3: Exposure to extreme abnormal heat outside typical use
Footer.replacementConditions1: Original purchase invoice must be provided
Footer.replacementConditions2: Damaged film sample must be submitted for inspection
Footer.replacementConditions3: Company may replace product; warranty does not cover installation or removal costs

Hero.title: The Best Insulation... The Real Solution for Our Summer
Hero.subtitle: Specifically designed for Saudi Arabia's extreme heat

Us.title: Why Choose Super Shield?
Us.qualityDescription: We guarantee the insulator’s quality for 5 years
Us.installationDescription: Protects you and your car’s interior from strong sunlight and high heat
Us.protectionDescription: We use the latest cutting technology to protect your car with no scratches or installation errors
Us.durabilityDescription: We offer you high quality at competitive prices
